review: Wanted Netflix and YouTube on my TV which does not have options like smart TVs have now a days. Worked well !
author: Sourabh K.

review: Definitely not up to my expectations bad connection hard to follow
author: Sara

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick was given to me as a gift. It is easy to install and operate but occasionally it loses connection and service is interrupted for a short period.
author: John E.

review: Love it.  Use it more often than Apple TV.
author: Billie Jo Repsher

review: Few problems are the remote, the extention cord, and big screen tv's. The stick behind a big screen tv seems to loose communication with the remote, so you press ti button once then when in the sling tv app the stick will think multiple presses have been made. So thinking use the extension short cord that comes with it to get it away from the tv so it can get a better signal still no help. So the stick is a great buy with smaller tv's or better placed HDMI ports, i have a 50 in Vizio UHD.
author: Sean

review: Thrilled with my new Amazon Fire TV Stick.  It is easy to install and set up.  I am loving it and do not miss cable t.v. at all!
author: Elaine V. O'Heir

review: I have the Fire and I like this even better.
author: lexicatblue

review: Awesome.  Works great for our tv that is not "smart".  Great wifi signal reception even on another floor in the opposite side of the house.
author: Jerrod
